"survivors are too op? well instead of giving killers stronger abilities lets just adjust the hitboxes to make this game unplayable" First it was freddy, now every killer has huntress and freddy's types of broken hitboxes. This has been an ongoing problem in the game since freddy got buffed(2019), and nobody thought it could get worse until this update. It has. I'm absolutely mind blown.

Primeiro de tudo, se voce quer saber logo, o jogo é muito bom! só há umas coisas que poderiam ser alteradas e até criadas do 0: Logo quando voce compra o jogo voce nao tem nenhum tipo de apoio e ajuda pra conseguir jogar o jogo decentemente, o tutorial é completamente INÚTIL, eu mesmo nunca entrei no tutorial.  Além disso há várias outras coisas que o jogo tem que ser aprimorado: O machtmaking nao é dos melhores, alguns hits nao eram pra ser contados, tem alguns killers que merecem rework, a aparencia dos personagens poderiam ser mais realistas, álem dos MUITOS bugs que FREQUENTEMENTE acontecem e tirando os muitos outros detalhes. Mas mesmo com tudo isso ainda é um dos meus jogos favoritos da atualidade.

He conocido este juego desde que salió esa Beta Privada que tuvieron en su momento en 2016 y bueno, qué decir a día de hoy de este juego... Está guay el concepto, me ha divertido mucho, por supuesto, pero últimamente llega un punto en el que te cansas de siempre lo mismo y no precisamente me refiero al gameplay del juego, que sí, de eso también me he cansado, pero no me refiero precisamente a eso, sino más bien de lo mal mantenido que se nota este juego siempre... Es un desastre en muchos aspectos, a pesar de que recibe contenido cada ciertos meses, se nota como un juego con un ambiente que va muriendo, con una comunidad terrible que siempre han tenido que ser ellos los que han tenido que "poner las normas" en este juego y técnicamente mal mantenido que a penas les cuestan unos cuantos meses para sacar algún tipo de parche que pueda solucionar alguna catástrofe en cuanto a problemas técnicos.

Es un juego con un gran potencial, pero lo siento muy mal mantenido técnicamente y este estudio parece que no le importa mucho en arreglar algunos aspectos del juego, como el gameplay, el balanceo o la optimización en sí, siempre y cuando puedan sacar algo de dinero de tus bolsillos con unas skins que valen 10 euros por lo menos y con un pase de batalla que tienen que solo parece que le ponen puros recoloreos y amuletos, ellos ya se van contentitos con eso...

Simplemente no puedo recomendarlo porque esta desarrolladora se siente como que les da igual todo y realmente no les va a importar una mierda el tema técnico del juego, gameplay, etc, hasta que no estén en una situación crítica en la que empiecen a perder muchísima pasta y jugadores.

From the new update with the hud/ui changed, i am stopping playing Dead by Daylight because this was the worst choice ever to change the hud,animations etc. There was no need to do this change, because most of the players now will not play anymore because this update ruined the game, and i personally can't play as survivor. I will return to the game when you will bring back the old hud/ui and animations etc.
And the graphics changes to the maps, also didn't need to do this, again wrong decision. One more thing, the skill check now is smoother and dead hard with the new animation is better now, + from me. That's all i wanted to say, i hope you devs will listen to the community and bring back old Dead by Daylight.

New user interface and game mechanics update has seemingly ruined playing survivor. No more spinning the killer or even pretty much dodging attacks at all. Makes it almost impossible to survive a chase if not right next to a pallet gym. The user interface looks pretty awful and is no improvement from the old UI. The graphics update is nice and a few of the animation changes are decent but most other aspects of this update are really unpleasent and game ruining.

Сначала игра была очень кайфовая, классная.Бегать от маньяков и играть за них. Подымать ранги и учиться долго бегать.Но после обновления 4.5.0 все измнилось в худшую сторону. Интерфейс стал как на дешёвой мобильной игре. Анимации выглядят очень странно и непривычно. Все стало очень плохо.

Наиграл в игру 424 часа.По началу игра была очень интересной мотивация получать высокие звание,фанится с друзьями.Но за тем в игру добавили обновление 4.5.0 которое полностью унесло игру в провал.Добавили интерфейс как в мобильной версии,тупой бег у сурвов, персонаж теперь бегает с ухудшенными поворотами,ущербно ползает и всё это заправлено тухлыми текстурками у карт.
Верните прошлый интерфэйс и физику персонажей. 09.02 DBD RIP

I love this game. It's a great way to raise my blood pressure.

Never thought I would ever make a review for this game cause i've always felt lukewarm about it but with this current version of dbd (4.5.0) I've never seen a patch that so wildly missed the mark on what anyone could of wanted from this game. The newest additions to things like asylum are a joke and most of the things have no collision along with new UI changes that are heavily influenced if not straight ripped from discord. 

These are just some of the things I've experienced with this new patch and I don't even want to talk about the "new animations" which were already in dbd but could only be experienced through the mobile addition which is it's own game with many mechanics that could be beneficial for dbd on PC/Console. 

It's just so embarrassing to see how patch after patch new things are implemented broken and unfinished along side issues and bugs that have been here for years that go unnoticed and neglected altogether which shows me just how blind or inept the devs of this game are. Personally I hope they revert this patch and leave it in the oven a lot longer... OR at least take advantage of the P.T.B they have and listen to the feedback they recieve cause it feels like anything the community says or brings to the table falls on deaf ears but I have to say that is untrue. For example we did get a response when the community asked about a colorblind mode and their response was "Alright JC it's getting really boring just blabbing about colorblind mode all the time, we've heard it a million times, we know, continuing to badger us about it isn't going to change anything," and also said "If it gets done, it'll get done when we have time to do it, or if somebody decides it's something that should be done, we know a lot of players want it, we know it's not a small number." LIKE WTF as someone who is colorblind this was basically the point that confirmed for me that the devs really don't care which lead me to think why should I? So i uninstalled the game and I don't think i'm going to play again soon.... It was nice while it lasted i suppose
